attributes.review: This app is making my phone crash way more than before i have a newer phone too. this app is no good DO NOT GET IT.
attributes.title: crashing

attributes.review: I tried go give it a chance, but it’s literally the worst. Trump and the app. Would give it 0 stars if I could.
attributes.title: The worst app I have ever downloaded

attributes.review: this app continues to crash and i can’t look at mr trumps campaign which makes me upset as i wanted to support him for the 2020 election. but now i have to settle for biden bc i don’t even know what trumps campaign is.
attributes.title: SETTLING FOR BIDEN

attributes.review: I don’t like the app is very glitchy and saying some weird stuff and also I keep seeing this weird orange 🍊 guy pop up so yeah pls fix this
What is this app?! I opened it and heard a loud ringing then everything disappeared around me. I think I am now inside the app. I am scared. I don’t know what’s going on. Please help
attributes.title: Where am I?

attributes.review: This is the most terrible horrible app I’ve ever downloaded in my life. It made me have manic depressive episodes and my dog died😭😭😭 not kidding it definitely had something to do with the app.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: Wow this app just legit gets stuck anytime you try to do anything. It stops working so easily. Horrible user experience.
attributes.title: Not a fan

attributes.review: When I downloaded it weird glitches started occurring where it turned me into a racist, a sexist, and a homophobe.😔very disappointing.
attributes.title: Glitches

attributes.review: I would give it 0 stars if given the option. The app stole my information and gave it to China.
attributes.title: Worse than Trump himself

attributes.review: Not bad, but not good. I certainly expected more from the Trump administration. I mean seriously, I thought it was supposed to be about politics, not a meet up spot for a bunch of rac/pists.🙄 very disappointing.
attributes.title: Not good
